paragraph: Yuuka Yano (矢野 優花, Yano Yūka, born January 6, 1998, in Miyazaki Prefecture) is a Japanese actress. She played the role of Fuka Igasaki (Shiro Ninger) in the 2015 Super Sentai TV series Shuriken Sentai Ninninger.

In 2014, Yano won the  1st Uniforms Women & Men's Contest modelling competition. In 2015, Yano acted in her first television role as Fuka Igasaki/Shironinger in the 39th Super Sentai series, Shuriken Sentai Ninninger.
Official profile at Stardust Promotion (in Japanese)
